name: CARMACloud
description: CARMA cloud plugin for making websocket connection with CARMA cloud .

configuration.description: The frequency to send the TIM in milliseconds.
Server IP address for V2X hub
Time from while the TCMs are requested, in days
The log level for this plugin
A comma separated list of strategies of MobilityOperation messages from CARMA vehicles.
After it receives TCM from carma cloud, it repeatedly broadcasts TCM until TCMRepeatTimeOut milliseconds.
The repeatedly broadcast thread should sleep for number of milliseconds.
The number of times TCMs with the same request id should be repeatedly broadcast within the time out period.

configuration.default: No response received from CMV after repeatedly broadcast TCMs.
configuration.description: If the plugin does not receives any aknowledgement from CMV within the configured seconds that match the original TCM, the plugin will create an NO ACK message and display it on UI.
